peril.views.slick.components

Interface Component

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChallengeMenu, HelpMenu, HelpMenu.HelpPage, Menu, MiniMap, PauseMenu, ProgressBar, ScrollBar, ScrollBar.Slider, StatsMenu, TextField, UpgradeMenu, UpgradeMenu.UnitTrader, VisualList, WarMenu

    public interface Component
    Defines the default behaviour of a visual component that can be initialised and drawn.
    Since:
    2018-02-19
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Frame, Point

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(Frame frame)
      Draws this Component on screen.
      Point getPosition()
      Retrieves the Point position of this Component.
      void init()
      Initialises this Components visual elements.
      void setPosition(Point position)
      Changes the Point position of the Component to the one specified.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Initialises this Components visual elements. This must be executed before it is drawn using draw(Frame).

      • draw

        void draw(Frame frame)
        Draws this Component on screen. init() must be called before this.
        Parameters:
        frame - The Frame used to draw the Component on screen.

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(Point position)
        Changes the Point position of the Component to the one specified.
        Parameters:
        position - The Point position of this Component.

      • getPosition

        Point getPosition()
        Retrieves the Point position of this Component.
        Returns:
        The new Point position of the Component.
